data.actual_result: Tapping the channel mention only takes you to the channel when you switch to that server
data.expected_result: Tapping the channel mention should take you directly to the channel
data.short_description: Tapping a channel mention in an in-app notification doesn’t take you directly to the channel
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you are on Online mode - Have someone mention you in a server with a channel mention for another channel in the server - Make sure you’re in a different server than the one you’re getting mentioned in - Tap the channel mention in the in-app notification - After the notification disappears, switch back to the server you were mentioned in - Observe the channel you’re in
